intro: Sanchezia dasia, commonly known as the golden wax plant, is a member of the Araliaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its glossy, waxy leaves that are typically dark green with a metallic sheen. It produces small, fragrant white flowers followed by orange-red berries. Sanchezia dasia is often cultivated as a decorative houseplant due to its attractive foliage and ease of care.
